item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

7. Bitcoin puzzle #66 was solved: 6.6 BTC (~$400k) withdrawn (131 points | 111 comments)

13. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
14. Randomness extractors: making fair coins out of biased coins (52 points | 16 comments)

26. Wild Thing: A Life of Paul Gauguin by Sue Prideaux Review (7 points | discuss)
27. Ask HN: Former gifted children with hard lives, how did you turn out? (90 points | 65 comments)
28. We're not going to run out of new anatomy anytime soon (165 points | 85 comments)
29. The Death of the Magazine (57 points | 54 comments)
30. Throwable tactical camera transmits 360° panoramic thermal images (53 points | 34 comments)
